issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
In eucalytpus a cloud administrator should be able to delete load balancers from another account. This currently fails with an error:

{code}
#
# euare-accountcreate test
test	000168894621
#
#
# euare-useraddkey --as-account test -u admin
AKIAA6E6HVQIYNMO2TOT
Dk3GvUL6tII8kgwb6qifmoBjeqVwcfq9ewPSabhd
#
#
# eulb-create-lb -z one -l "lb-port=8080, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=8080, instance-protocol=HTTP" balancer-1 -I AKIAA6E6HVQIYNMO2TOT -S Dk3GvUL6tII8kgwb6qifmoBjeqVwcfq9ewPSabhd
DNS_NAME	balancer-1-000168894621.lb.b-22.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
# 
#
# eulb-describe-lbs -I AKIAA6E6HVQIYNMO2TOT -S Dk3GvUL6tII8kgwb6qifmoBjeqVwcfq9ewPSabhd
LOAD_BALANCER	balancer-1	balancer-1-000168894621.lb.b-22.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2016-12-01T18:31:44.88Z	internet-facing
#
# 
# eulb-delete-lb balancer-1-000168894621.lb.b-22.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
eulb-delete-lb: error (InternalFailure): Failed to delete the loadbalancer: internal error
# 
#
{code}

related logs from ufs:

{code}

fields.summary: ELB administrator cannot delete elb using dns name

comments.body:
There is a pull request with an n4j test covering this issue here:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/n4j/pull/33
To test, try deleting non-admin account's ELB using eucalyptus credential.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create Eucalyptus VPC Cloud - [hspencer-400-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/400/]
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{development-operations}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Use linked {{cfn-elb-vpc-template.json}} template to create a stack:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-elb-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
DESCRIPTION	CloudFormation template to create an ELB in Eucalyptus VPC
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-create-stack ELBStack --template-file cfn-elb-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ELBStack/5e590376-b848-4cb8-aad0-19d3d025b365
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	ELBStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to create an ELB in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-17T21:52:47.626Z
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Using {{eucalyptus/admin}} user, delete the load balancer using the DNS name:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region devops-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO	ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2017-02-17T21:52:53.669Z	internet-facing

[root@h-04 ~]# eulb-delete-lb ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com --region euca-admin@

[root@h-04 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region devops-admin@
[root@h-04 ~]#
{code}
# Confirm the ELB instance is terminated under the {{(eucalyptus)loadbalancing}} account:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region elb-admin@
RESERVATION	r-e64fb0fa	000389956352
INSTANCE	i-bb2f183b	emi-f3290442			terminated	elb-admin	0		m1.medium	2017-02-17T21:53:04.419Z	black-dollar		monitoring-enabled			vpc-98995982	subnet-3fb11d27	instance-store					hvm		260dc28a-be01-48f2-ac52-7ec952ca2cf5_black-dollar_1				arn:aws:iam::000389956352:instance-profile/internal/loadbalancer/loadbalancer-vm-000727120439-ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-bb2f183b	aws:autoscaling:groupName	euca-internal-elb-000727120439-ELBStack-ELB-JKKAO7P6KF8ZO-black-dollar
TAG	instance	i-bb2f183b	service-type	loadbalancing
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
